description: Executable that runs a process injection into the chosen process. XOR'd shell code with sleep sandbox evasion.

customAttributes.name: xorByte
customAttributes.description: The hex representation of the byte that the payload will be XOR'd with. Max 0xFF.

customAttributes.name: compile
customAttributes.description: Whether or not to compile. Y/N

customAttributes.name: processToInjectInto
customAttributes.description: Process to inject into. For explorer.exe just put explorer.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of file to be created, can be full path or just a name
